matachi.asteroids.game

Class DPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • matachi.asteroids.game.DPoint

  • public class DPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that describes a point with two doubles. Useful in game developing for describing position, velocity and acceleration. There is a Java class called Point, but it uses ints, which is more accurate but not as "flexible". This class allows for smaller and smoothers movements.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniel "MaTachi" Jonsson

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates an instance of a 2D double coordinate with (0, 0).

      Creates an instance of a 2D double coordinate.
      DPoint(DPoint p)
      Creates an instance of a 2D double coordinate from another DPoint.

      • move

        public void move(double x,
        double y)
        Move the coordinate with amount given in the parameters. To clarify: This method doesn't move the point to the specified coordinate, but instead adds to the already exisiting location.
        Parameters:
        x - move the x coordiante
        y - move the y coordiante
